Fecha: 09-01-2014
Release: FANiSO


The true meaning of fear ... 
Once upon a time, fairy tales were valuable cautionary yarns filled with warnings and sage advice. However, over time, the stories have become so watered down with cute woodland creatures and happy endings that they have lost their true meaning and purpose. Not any more! This is American McGee's Grimm, and ends happily ever now! 
Experience an amazing adventure around the most famous fairy tales in the world. As Grimm, you will transform the classic tales of Little Red Riding Hood, Cinderella, Jack and the Beanstalk, and more of your favorites in darkly twisted Grimm versions of themselves in 23 episodes. Game Each episode focuses on one of the most popular fairy tales in the world and offers 30 minutes. Each episode is a full, independent and episodes can be played in any order experience.
